00057 class HooksManager extends AbstractSingleton
00058 {
00059 //----------------------------------------------------------------- PUBLIC
00060 
00061 //--------------------------------------------------------- public methods
00062         
00063 
00076     public static function GetInstance ( )
00077         {       
00078                 return parent::getThis( __CLASS__ );
00079         } //---- End of GetInstance
00080 
00095     public function UnRegister( $hookName, $method, $removeAll = true )
00096     {
00097                 if ( is_array ( $this->listeners[ $hookName ] ) )
00098                 {
00099                         foreach ( $this->listeners[ $hookName ] as $key => $val )
00100                         {
00101                                 if ( $method == $val )
00102                                 {
00103                                         unset( $this->listeners[ $hookName ][ $key ] );
00104                                         
00105                                         if ( ! $removeAll )
00106                                         {
00107                                                 return;
00108                                         }
00109                                 }
00110                         }
00111                 }
00112     } //---- End of UnRegister
00113 
00126     public function Register( $hookName, $method, $allowMultiple = false )
00127     {
00128                 if ( ! is_array ( @ $this->listeners[ $hookName ] ) )
00129                 {
00130                         $this->listeners[ $hookName ] = array();
00131                 }
00132         
00133                 if ( ! $allowMultiple && in_array ( $this->listeners[ $hookName ], $method ) )
00134                 {
00135                         return;
00136                 }
00137                 
00138                 $this->listeners[ $hookName ][] = $method;
00139     } //---- End of Register
00140 
00151     public function Trigger( $hookName, $params )
00152     {
00153                 if ( is_array ( @ $this->listeners[ $hookName ] ) )
00154                 // if there is some listener for this Hook
00155                 {
00156                         foreach (  $this->listeners[ $hookName ] as $callBack )
00157                         {
00158                                 if ( is_callable ( $callBack ) )
00159                                 {
00160                                         call_user_func_array ( $callBack, $params );
00161                                 }
00162                                 else
00163                                 {
00164                                         throw new Exception();
00165                                 }
00166                         }
00167                 }
00168     } //---- End of Trigger
00169 
00180     public function BuildInstanceHook( AbstractClass $object, $hookName )
00181     {
00182                 return get_class($object).$hookName.$object;
00183     } //---- End of BuildInstanceHook
00184 
00185 //-------------------------------------------- Constructeurs - destructeur
00190     protected function __construct( )
00191     {
00192                 $this->listeners = array();
00193     } //---- End of constructeur
00194 
00198     public function __destruct ( )
00199     {
00200                 parent::__destruct();
00201                 
00202                 unset ( $this->listeners );
00203     } //---- End of destructor
00204  
00205 //---------------------------------------------------------- Magic Methods
00206 
00213     function __ToString ( )
00214     {
00215         return parent::__ToString();
00216     } // End of __ToString
